article_title: Can someone else walk my dog? And more COVID-19 questions from Nova Scotians, answered
article_description: What does community spread mean  When will we start to flatten the curve  Are people who recover from COVID 19 immune  How is the school year going to continue
article_content: Q  We have community spread now  What does that mean  What is the province doing differently In cases of community spread  public health workers have not been able to find a link  even a second or third hand link to someone who travelled  Alternatively  t   9116 chars
